sentences.en: And he laid the parchment out on the table before them.
sentences.cn: 他当众在桌上放一张羊皮纸.

sentences.en: Cover with a sheet of non-stick baking parchment.
sentences.cn: 用一张不粘烘焙仿羊皮纸包上。

sentences.en: For example, animal skins called parchment and vellum were used by the ancient Greeks.
sentences.cn: 例如, 古希腊人使用过动物皮子,如羔皮(parchment)和犊皮(Vellum).

sentences.en: Her complexion is like parchment very much the worse for wear.
sentences.cn: 她的皮肤象一副羊皮,根本不配披在身上.

sentences.en: I found corn husks and parchment paper in her house.
sentences.cn: 我在她家里发现了玉米壳和羊皮纸.

sentences.en: Jon moved the cup aside and read the parchment once again.
sentences.cn: 琼恩移开杯子,又重读了一遍诏书.

sentences.en: On that day, the realm of France received on parchment a stupendous accession.
sentences.cn: 那一天, 法国的领土在羊皮纸的文件上获得了绝大的扩张.

sentences.en: People used parchment to wrap greasy food in ancient times.
sentences.cn: 古时候人们使用羊皮纸包油腻的食物.

sentences.en: So Adelmo gave the parchment to Berengar.
sentences.cn: 这么说阿德尔摩把那张羊皮纸给了贝仁格.

sentences.en: The completed parchment was trimmed to page size and also glued into long rolls.
sentences.cn: 制成的羊皮纸可以裁剪成页,也可以粘成长幅.

sentences.en: The minister withdrew the parchment from the bag.
sentences.cn: 牧师从口袋里抽出那张羊皮纸宣言.

sentences.en: The parchment came / fell to bits ( ie disintegrated ) in my hands.
sentences.cn: 羊皮纸在我手中成了碎片.

sentences.en: The writing on the parchment had faded until it was almost illegible.
sentences.cn: 羊皮纸上的字迹已褪色,到了差不多让人认不清的地步.

sentences.en: What a big piece of parchment it must have been!
sentences.cn: 立约所用的,一定是一块很大的羊皮纸了.

sentences.en: You may find ancient words of power written upon scrolls of parchment.
sentences.cn: 你也许会在那些羊皮卷轴上发现用古老文字写下的力量.

trans.tran_cn: 羊皮纸，文凭，上等纸，羊皮纸古文稿
trans.tran_en: a material used in the past for writing on, made from the skin of a sheep or a goat
